channel.title: How to make a new shop with different currency then gp
channel.description: I'm trying to figure out how to make a new shop with different currency then gp for example adding tickets in because a lot people got max cash and trying to make items over 2b+ also need to know how to put items in shop and trade them in with tickets instead gp.

item.title: How to make a new shop with different currency then gp
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

Use this awesome tutorial for that.


Currency tutorial!

item.title: How to make a new shop with different currency then gp
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

well first, add the name of your currency to the int list in player.java

and then go into shop assistant
and under the shop id add

if (c.nameyouusedin player.java>= TotPrice2) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) { //buyDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.nameyouusedin player.java -= TotPrice2; c.getItems().addItem(itemID, 1); Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot] -= 1; Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[c.myShopId]) { Server.shopHandler.ShopItems[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough space in your inventory."); break; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough nameyouusedin player.java"); break; } } ;D
